mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.template_id AS "templateId", a.staff_prop_id AS "templatePropId", a.staff_prop_type AS "templatePropType", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

mapper.update: UPDATE staff_prop_template SET template_id = #{templateId}, staff_prop_id = #{templatePropId}, staff_prop_type = #{templatePropType}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
